full_text:
Florida Department of Law Enforcement
Criminal Investigations and Forensic Science Services
Enforcement and Investigative Support
Post Office Box 1489
Tallahassee, FL 32302-1489
www.fdle.state.fl.us
Richard L. Swearingen Commissioner
Ron DeSantis, Governor
Ashley Moody, Attorney General
Jimmy Patronis, Chief Financial Officer
Nikki Fried, Commissioner of Agriculture
August 12, 2019
Good afternoon,
I am requesting documentation on deceased person #76318-054, Jeffrey Epstein.
The subject is currently a registered sexual offender in the state of Florida.
In order for his status to be updated to deceased we require documentation from your facility.
Please call if you have any questions: 1-888-357-7332.
Thank you in advance for your assistance.
Respectfully,
[b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Criminal Justice Information Consultant
EIS/MPOR/ORDM
Florida Dept. of Law Enforcement
Service • Integrity • Respect • Quality

additional_notes: The document is a letter from the Florida Department of Law Enforcement requesting documentation on deceased person #76318-054, Jeffrey Epstein.
